data_type: minimum necessary information require for integration
text: Rest assured, we only share the minimum necessary information required for the integration and strictly adhere to Zoom's privacy and security protocols.

Otherwise, we will retain your personal information, subject to the "Data Retention" Section above, but we will take measures to pseudonymize or anonymize it.
We may share your personal information by disclosing it to a third party for a business purpose.
We will only retain personal information for a period of time consistent with the original purposes for which we collected it, as described in this Privacy Policy, including, as applicable, (i) for as long as we have an ongoing relationship with the individual to whom the information pertains; (ii) as long as needed to provide users, our customers, or our partners the services; (iii) as necessary to comply with our legal obligations; (iv) as necessary to resolve disputes or to protect ourselves from potential future disputes; or (v) as necessary to enforce our agreements.
